item.title: Write for yourself
item.description: I have doubted myself for a long time, about the purpose of my writing. Is it for the readers or solely self entertainment? I write helplessly, for the sake of leisure.

item.title: The Battle Is Over
item.description: How’s the feeling when you keep insisting on things that seem impossible to achieve? That’s how I feel currently. There’s a show near my house which plays the music quite loud from mid of the day until late at night. It makes me frustrated since I can’t focus on learning. Conversely, I keep sitting at the table with the hope that I will concentrate more on absorbing the knowledge, when my headphones don’t have the block noise function.
